entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How may I assist you today?
I need to return something. And I need to do it NOW. I've been on hold forever.
I apologize for the wait time. I understand you'd like to process a return. Can I get your order number, please?
Thank you. Let me pull that up. Okay, I see here you purchased a VeloBand Pulse. What seems to be the issue?
The VeloBand Pulse just isn't working for me. It's not tracking my sleep properly, and honestly, it's more trouble than it's worth. I want to return it.
I understand. How long ago did you purchase the VeloBand Pulse?
I got it… like 15 days ago. What’s the hold up? Can I return this smart watch or not?

Yes, absolutely. Our return policy is 90 days, so you are well within that window. Let me go ahead and process that return for you. I apologize for any inconvenience you've experienced with the VeloBand Pulse.
Ninety days? I thought the website said something about 30. I was getting worried. Are you sure? You said 90 days, right?

Yes, I am sure. The standard return policy is 90 days, and that applies to your VeloBand Pulse. Let me just initiate the return process and email you a prepaid shipping label. You'll need to pack the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, if you still have it.
Okay, that's great. I still have the box. So I just print the label, stick it on, and send it back? What about my refund?
Exactly. Once we receive the returned VeloBand Pulse, we'll process a full refund to your original payment method. You should see it reflected in your account within 7-10 business days.
Perfect! This is a relief. Thank you so much for making this so easy! I was dreading this call.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's it. Thank you again.
Have a wonderful day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
